CustomField.description: BRP Used Field to track long term contracts of 25 - 30 years on opportunities. TAD, it is a number generated by the risk group that would be helpful for them to filter the deals by, it identifies very long term deals.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: TAD, it is a number generated by the risk group to filter the deals by, it identifies very long term deals.
CustomField.label: TAD ID
